4984.<voice 04074_00004984><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04074_00004984><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>You moron! Keep your voice down!!<stop_lip_animation n00392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04583_00004989><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>My goodness... that monster of legend

<voice 04623_00028448><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Is what Kukulkannibal said true, Dura?

4990.<voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes... it appears so.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4991.<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>That a man of your caliber could

4997.<voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura is... my brother...?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5000.<voice 05703_00005000><start_lip_sync n0:

5001.<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>...perhaps the Boronus Hole at the

5002.<voice 05872_00005002><start_lip_sync n0:

5003.<voice 05971_00005003><start_lip_sync n0:

5037.<voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>What?! Is that true?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5042.<voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>What's happening to the Sun Stone?!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5044.<voice 01405_00005044><start_lip_sync n0:

5045.<voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>So, what should we do...?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5047.<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I shall stop it!

5048.<voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Don't bother! You are not of royalty!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5049.<voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Why can't you just admit it?!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5050.<voice 01895_00005050><start_lip_sync n0:

recognized for it!!

5051.<voice 01975_00005051><start_lip_sync n0:

<voice 09440_00005087><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>King Woolard, I apologize for
my outbursts. I will never again step
foot on Dolworm soil.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5088.<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Wait, Dura! There is not a single
researcher here who could replace
you as Director.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5089.<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>You could've created the Sun Stone
someday without Kukulkannibal's
intervention! I truly believe that!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5092.<voice 09792_00005092><start_lip_sync n0:
Dura. You shall remain as head of the Royal Research Institute. I ask that you continue to lend me
your strength for Dolworm's sake.

5094.<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>And of course, we mustn't forget!
<pc>, the hero of Dolworm, who valiantly

5095.<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>As your reward, I shall give you the
